name: wordpress-expert
description: Expert WordPress diagnostics: security audits, performance analysis, code quality review, and plugin conflict resolution for site reliability.

connect.description: Connect to a WordPress site via SSH, detect WP-CLI, sync files, and save profile

status.description: View connected sites, sync status, and manage site profiles (list, remove, default, rename)

diagnose.description: Run full diagnostic suite on a connected WordPress site

audit.description: Run focused security audit on a connected WordPress site
